snippet: A report that the manufacturing sector in the United States had rebounded helped keep the stock market close to nominal levels, while falling oil prices dragged down energy stocks.
abstract: Report that manufacturing sector in United States has rebounded helps keep stock market close to nominal levels, while falling oil prices drag down energy stocks.
lead_paragraph: A report that the manufacturing sector in the United States had rebounded helped keep the stock market close to nominal levels, while falling oil prices dragged down energy stocks.

headline.main: Positive Manufacturing News Keeps Market Steady
headline.print_headline: Positive Manufacturing News Keeps Market Steady
